# scrape-property-profiles

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repo contains codes that scrape house prices from https://www.auhouseprices.com. Please use the website responsibly by setting the number of crawlers low and around delay between each call.

Dependencies

- Rcrawler: for crawling the website to extract house price data
- data.table: for processing extracted data
- furrr: for parallelizing operations
- parallel
- magrittr: piping of functions
